languages.text: "Надеюсь, вы понимаете, почему я казнил{mf||а} Великого Регента".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, вы понимаете, почему я казнил{mf||а} Великого Регента".

languages.text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, вы понимаете, почему я казнил{mf||а} Великого Регента".

traits.locale_text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."
"I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."
"I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."
"I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."
"I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."

languages.text: “我处决了大摄政王，我希望你能理解这个决定。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."

traits.locale_text: “我处决了大摄政王，我希望你能理解这个决定。”

languages.text: «Espero que entienda por qué ejecuté al gran regente».
languages.original_text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que entienda por qué ejecuté al gran regente».

languages.text: 「私がグレート・リージェントを処刑した理由を理解してくれることを願うよ」
languages.original_text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."

traits.locale_text: 「私がグレート・リージェントを処刑した理由を理解してくれることを願うよ」

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr versteht, warum ich den Großregenten habe hinrichten lassen."
languages.original_text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr versteht, warum ich den Großregenten habe hinrichten lassen."

languages.text: « J'espère que vous comprenez pourquoi j'ai dû faire exécuter le vénérable régent. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous comprenez pourquoi j'ai dû faire exécuter le vénérable régent. »

languages.text: "Umarım Yüce Naip'i neden idam ettirdiğimi anlıyorsundur."
languages.original_text: "I hope you understand why I had the Great Regent executed."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım Yüce Naip'i neden idam ettirdiğimi anlıyorsundur."
